data.title: NCC Main Subject
data.meta_description: NCC Main subject  - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The Indian Army is the largest branch of the Indian Armed Forces and is headed by the Chief of Army Staff. The country is divided into 8 theatre commands, each headed by a Lieutenant General. The Indian Army aims to maintain sovereignty and territorial integrity of the nation. Other branches like the police and Central Armed Police Forces also aim to ensure national security and law and order under the Ministry of Defence and Ministry of Home Affairs respectively.
